comment: * Intrinsic for performing a resize of a 2D allocation. * * @deprecated Renderscript has been deprecated in API level 31. Please refer to the migration * guide for the proposed alternatives.

methods.name: public static ScriptIntrinsicResize create(RenderScript rs)
methods.comment:
* Supported elements types are {@link Element#U8}, {@link
     * Element#U8_2}, {@link Element#U8_3}, {@link Element#U8_4}
     * {@link Element#F32}, {@link Element#F32_2}, {@link
     * Element#F32_3}, {@link Element#F32_4}
     *
     * @param rs The RenderScript context
     *
     * @return ScriptIntrinsicResize

methods.name: public void setInput(Allocation ain)
methods.comment:
* Set the input of the resize.
     * Must match the element type supplied during create.
     *
     * @param ain The input allocation.

methods.name: public Script.FieldID getFieldID_Input()
methods.comment:
* Get a FieldID for the input field of this intrinsic.
     *
     * @return Script.FieldID The FieldID object.

methods.name: public void forEach_bicubic(Allocation aout)
methods.comment:
* Resize copy the input allocation to the output specified. The
     * Allocation is rescaled if necessary using bi-cubic
     * interpolation.
     *
     * @param aout Output allocation. Element type must match
     *             current input.  Must not be same as input.

methods.name: public void forEach_bicubic(Allocation aout, Script.LaunchOptions opt)
methods.comment:
* Resize copy the input allocation to the output specified. The
     * Allocation is rescaled if necessary using bi-cubic
     * interpolation.
     *
     * @param aout Output allocation. Element type must match
     *             current input.
     * @param opt LaunchOptions for clipping

methods.name: public Script.KernelID getKernelID_bicubic()
methods.comment:
* Get a KernelID for this intrinsic kernel.
     *
     * @return Script.KernelID The KernelID object.

methodNames: public void forEach_bicubic(Allocation aout, Script.LaunchOptions opt)
